title: *Permission will be based on the minimum of areas in (a), (c) or (f) above
clause_text: *Permission will be based on the minimum of areas in (a), (c) or (f) above. Note. -INDICATE DETAILS ON THE SITE/BUILDING PLAN AS IN FORM 1. Are all plans as required under Regulations 10(3) enclosed? What is the permissible Floor Space Index of the Zone?

source_pdf.text_snippet: *Permission will be based on the minimum of areas in (a), (c) or (f) above. Note. -INDICATE DETAILS ON THE SITE/BUILDING PLAN AS IN FORM 1.
